cause.description:
This cause is for people who want to educate people about pediatric brain tumors. Plus, supporting research for both treatment of pediatric brain tumors, and research to help in the prevention of them.
Types of pediatric brain tumors: Cerebellar astrocytoma- around 20% Medulloblastoma- 10-20% Ependymoma- 8-10% Brainstem glioma- 10-15% Craniopharyngioma- <10%
1. Educate people about pediatric brain tumors.
2. Support pediatric brain tumor prevention.
3. Support pediatric brain tumor treatment innovations.
4. Support the programs that help brain tumor patients reassimilate into everyday life after battling their brain tumors.
cause.mission: To educate people about brain tumors in children and teens
cause.name: Pediatric Brain Tumor Awareness
